title: ADC 24 Bit Mode
description: The AnyShake Explorer uses ADS1262, a 32-bit analog-to-digital converter (ADC) with 32-bit resolution. But in most cases, we only need 24-bit data. The 24-bit mode allows the ADC to directly output 24-bit data, which can reduce noise to a certain extent. 24 bit mode is enabled by default in AnyShake Explorer.
